sentences.sentence: We studied the genetic law of prematurity in spring wheat by using biostatistics method.
sentences.translation: 用生物统计学方法，对春小麦早熟性的遗传规律进行了研究。

sentences.sentence: Even so, Professor Sheila Bird of the MRC's biostatistics unit and the Royal Statistical Society, sounds a cautious note.
sentences.translation: 尽管如此，医学研究所生物统计学部门和皇家统计学社的希拉·伯德教授就表示要谨慎对待。

sentences.sentence: Although an individual can earn a BS in Biostatistics at a number of well respected college campuses, this is just the beginning.
sentences.translation: 虽然个人可以获取受人尊敬的大学校园生物统计学学士学位，这仅仅是开始。
